title: FS: PSA 3 & SGC 40/3 T206 Commons – most with less common backs
author: willworkforT206

posts.post_title: FS: PSA 3 & SGC 40/3 T206 Commons – most with less common backs
posts.post_content:
I'm selling off some of my T206 doubles. I have the following available:

Al Shaw, Sovereign 150, PSA 3, no creases, just corner/edge wear and minor soiling, $55 SOLD
George Stone, Sovereign 350, PSA 3, no creases, just corner/edge wear, $35 SOLD
Heinie Berger, Sweet Caporal 350/30, PSA 3, no creases, nice color and image, $30 SOLD 
Al Mattern, Polar Bear, SGC 40/3, no creases, just corner wear, nice image and bold colors, $40  SOLD
Eddie Phelps, Polar Bear, SGC 40/3, no creases, tobacco stains galore, $32 SOLD
Al Shaw, El Principe de Gales, SGC 40/3, light corner crease upper right, nice clean back, $65

Prices include shipping. Add $2.00 for insurance (at buyer’s option). 

E-mails committing to purchase take priority over posts. Please e-mail me at [URL="sschris@att.net"]sschris@att.net[/URL] if interested. 

Paypal is my preferred method of payment, but other arrangements can be made.

PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE. I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME. I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS. THANKS.

Thanks for looking.

Steve
